text: "Love Never Felt So Good" is a song by American singer and songwriter Michael Jackson, released posthumously in 2014 as part of the album Xscape. The track features a blend of Jackson's signature pop and soul style, with infectious melodies and smooth grooves. It was co-written by Michael Jackson and Paul Anka and showcases themes of joy and the euphoric feeling of love. The song received positive reviews from critics and fans, celebrating Jackson's timeless talent. It was also notable for its upbeat production and was included in various remixes and performances.
title: Love Never Felt So Good
